    public abstract class EventHandlerMethod<T,R extends MethodResult>
extends AbstractHandlerMethod<T,io.spine.base.EventMessage,io.spine.core.EventClass,io.spine.core.EventEnvelope,R>
    An abstract base for methods handling events.

      • checkAttributesMatch

        protected void checkAttributesMatch(io.spine.core.EventEnvelope envelope)
        Ensures that the passed event matches the external attribute of the method annotation.

        If the method annotated to accept external events, the event passed to the handler method must be produced outside of the Bounded Context to which the handling entity belongs.

        And vice versa, if the event handling method is designed for domestic events, it does not accept external events.

        Overrides:
        checkAttributesMatch in class AbstractHandlerMethod<T,io.spine.base.EventMessage,io.spine.core.EventClass,io.spine.core.EventEnvelope,R extends MethodResult>
        Parameters:
        envelope - the envelope with the massed to handle
        See Also:
        Subscribe.external(), React.external()
